ppcalls.label: GDC API (GENCODE)
ppcalls.message:
To view a different gene from the GDC dataset:
  • Scroll to the top of the page. Select 'human hg38' from the dropdown menu in the header.
  • Start typing the gene into the search bar. A vertical menu of gene options will appear. Click the appropriate option or hit enter.
  • The protein view of the gene will appear. Click on
    GDC
    in the toolbar.

ppcalls.label: GDC API (RefSeq)
ppcalls.message:
To view a different gene from the GDC dataset:
  • Scroll to the top of the page. Select 'human hg38' from the dropdown menu in the header.
  • Start typing the gene into the search bar. A vertical menu of gene options will appear. Click the appropriate option or hit enter.
  • The protein view of the gene will appear. Click on
    GDC
    in the toolbar.

ppcalls.label: Custom Data (Differential Phosphorylation)
ppcalls.message:
Create custom datasets with the mds3 track. In this example, custom data points with a specified value and custom mutatiion classes are shown. See the skewerModes attributes applied to the custom variants.

Tip: Clicking on a class label in the legend shows and hides the mutation data.

ppcalls.label: Data Point Shapes (Differential Phosphorylation)
ppcalls.message: Add additional detail to lollipops by specifying the data point shape. Available shapes are described in the lollipop wiki page. With the .legend.customShapeLabels object, the count and additional details appears in the legend for each shape.

ppcalls.label: Setting default display
ppcalls.message: Adding gmmode to the block level sets the default display. Valid values are protein, exon only, splicing RNA, and genomic

ribbonMessage: Please see our newest examples for displaying cnv data: GDC CNV and Custom CNV and SNV Data.
